file_name.description: The original filename of the garment image (e.g., 'blue_t-shirt.png').

model.description: The specific model of the garment for its given type (e.g., 'Type 1 trucker jacket' for a denim jacket, 'Storm Rider' for a Lee jacket, 'Crew Neck' for a t-shirt).

style.description: The aesthetic style of the garment (e.g., 'casual', 'formal', 'sporty', 'vintage', 'bohemian').

formality.description: The level of formality of the garment (e.g., 'informal', 'business casual', 'semi-formal', 'formal').

percentage.description: The percentage of this material in the garment must be between 0 and 100.

material_composition.description: A detailed breakdown of the garment's material composition, with percentages for each material. The sum of percentages should be 100%.

color_palette.description: An array of dominant colors or color patterns in the garment (e.g., ['blue', 'white'], ['black'], ['floral print']).

suitable_weather.description: An array of weather conditions for which the garment is suitable (e.g., ['warm', 'mild', 'hot', 'cool', 'cold', 'rainy', 'snowy']).

suitable_time_of_day.description: An array of times of day for which the garment is suitable (e.g., ['morning', 'afternoon', 'evening', 'night', 'all day']).

suitable_places.description: An array of places or environments where the garment would be appropriate (e.g., 'work from home', 'office', 'church', 'restaurant', 'park', 'gym', 'beach', 'city', 'countryside').

suitable_occasions.description: An array of occasions for which the garment is suitable (e.g., 'daily life', 'work', 'family walk', 'city walk', 'formal event', 'casual gathering', 'exercise', 'party', 'travel').

features.description: A brief textual description of the garment, summarizing its key features and potential uses.

id.description: A unique numeric identifier for the garment.

favorite.description: Whether the garment is a favorite.
